response.explain: The previous action code has successfully toggled on the stove to cook the mustard leaf. There is no execution error. The next step is to wait for the mustard leaf to be cooked.
response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot to the countertop.
(2) Grasp the mixing bowl from the countertop.
(3) Move the robot to the bottom cabinet.
(4) Open the bottom cabinet.
(5) Grasp the saucepan from the bottom cabinet.
(6) Move the robot to the countertop.
(7) Grasp the mustard leaf from the countertop.
(8) Put the mustard leaf into the saucepan.
(9) Move the robot to the stove.
(10) Put the saucepan on the stove.
(11) Toggle on the stove to cook the mustard leaf.
(12) Wait for the mustard leaf to be cooked.
